name: Alien Thieves From Outer Space Stealing Old Farmer's Pumpkins
name_original: Alien Thieves From Outer Space Stealing Old Farmer's Pumpkins
description:
Some boredom game made in a day.

Two alien thieves get hungry and want to steal some pumpkins from old farmer. Help them do it!

Clean the area of rocks so pumpkins can grow bigger.

Collect them before they explode but when then are big enough.
